biz.gabrys.lesscss.extended.compiler.source

Class AbstractUriSourceFactory<T extends LessSource>

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.gabrys.lesscss.extended.compiler.source.AbstractUriSourceFactory<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - created instances type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConcreteSourceFactory<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClasspathSourceFactory, FtpSourceFactory, HttpSourceFactory

    public abstract class AbstractUriSourceFactory<T extends LessSource>
extends Object
implements ConcreteSourceFactory<T>
    Helps to develop ConcreteSourceFactory implementations which create LessSource from URI.
    Since:
    2.1.0

        protected abstract T createSource(URI uri,
                                  String encoding)
                           throws Exception
        Creates a new instance of LessSource.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI which pointer to the imported source file.
        encoding - the encoding of the LessSource which contains import.
        Returns:
        the new instance of LessSource.
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurred during creation of the source.
